Series.Actors: |Josh Radnor|Neil Patrick Harris|Alyson Hannigan|Jason Segel|Cobie Smulders|Bob Saget|Cristin Milioti|
Series.Overview: It all started when Ted's best friend, Marshall, dropped the bombshell that he was going to propose to his longtime girlfriend, Lily, a kindergarten teacher. At that moment, Ted realized that he had better get a move on if he, too, hopes to find true love. Helping him in his quest is his friend Barney, a confirmed bachelor with a foolproof way to meet women.
